query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `memory_logs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `markId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `memoryType` enum('activation','event_attended','decision_visible','chapter_change','unmarking','state_change','mark_revoked') NOT NULL,
  `referenceId` int,
  `referenceType` varchar(64),
  `description` text,
  `visibilityLevel` enum('full_context','partial','hidden') DEFAULT 'full_context' NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `memory_logs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `orders` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `dropId` int NOT NULL,
  `markId` int,
  `status` enum('pending','confirmed','shipped','delivered','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `shippingName` varchar(255),
  `shippingPhone` varchar(32),
  `shippingAddress` text,
  `shippingCity` varchar(128),
  `shippingPostalCode` varchar(16),
  `selectedSize` varchar(8),
  `totalIdr` int,
  `paymentMethod` varchar(64),
  `paymentReference` varchar(128),
  `paidAt` timestamp,
  `trackingNumber` varchar(128),
  `shippedAt` timestamp,
  `deliveredAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `orders_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3gXnTNTdZCBcu6S.3066a4e269ee --database cVz8pxyPALhhBHJqgpAifY --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `memory_logs` (

  `markId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `memoryType` enum('activation','event_attended','decision_visible','chapter_change','unmarking','state_change','mark_revoked') NOT NULL,
  `referenceId` int,
  `referenceType` varchar(64),
  `description` text,
  `visibilityLevel` enum('full_context','partial','hidden') DEFAULT 'full_context' NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `memory_logs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `orders` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `dropId` int NOT NULL,
  `markId` int,
  `status` enum('pending','confirmed','shipped','delivered','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `shippingName` varchar(255),
  `shippingPhone` varchar(32),
  `shippingAddress` text,
  `shippingCity` varchar(128),
  `shippingPostalCode` varchar(16),
  `selectedSize` varchar(8),
  `totalIdr` int,
  `paymentMethod` varchar(64),
  `paymentReference` varchar(128),
  `paidAt` timestamp,
  `trackingNumber` varchar(128),
  `shippedAt` timestamp,
  `deliveredAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `orders_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
